alert.note: Alert for Mineral and Southern Lyon Counties; Western Nevada Basin and Range including Pyramid Lake (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 17 at 3:49PM PDT by NWS Reno
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHWESTERN CHURCHILL... NORTHWESTERN MINERAL AND CENTRAL LYON COUNTIES THROUGH 415 PM PDT... At 348 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles southeast of Yerington, or 35 miles northeast of Topaz Lake, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Heavy rains may cause localized flooding. Locations impacted include... Alt U.S 95 At Lyon-Mineral Co Line and Schurz. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Mineral and Southern Lyon Counties; Western Nevada Basin and Range including Pyramid Lake
